ygData.msgSnippet: OOC: First off, why in the hell would I want to argue with you? Second, I just got used to the word founders because of Yahoo Clubs. No biggie. Third, thanks

OOC: First off, why in the hell would I want to argue with you? Second, I j=
ust got used to the word founders because of Yahoo Clubs. No biggie. Third,=
 thanks for founding the RPG, it's given me alot of joy. Fourth, Roland is =
cool, it came from a Stephen king Book series, called the Dark Tower. Fifth=
, thanks for calling me that. Sixth, anyone remember when Nashtah@hotmail.c=
om was in the RPG? Just asking...

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: =
hugar_twriker@... 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, July=
 20, 2001 12:46 AM
  Subject: OOC Reply to Questions OOC


  OOC:  Sorry, t=
his is and OOC message, if you don't want to Read it 
  then skip it...


 =
 OOC:  I guess you want to be called Roland now, so i will call you 
  Rola=
nd.  First off why do you think I used the word founder and not 
  the word=
 Council Member.  Because a founder had power before all the 
  founders qu=
it and then the council took over because they wanted the 
  RPG to continu=
e.

     If you Read the about section at nbwrpg.com, then you will hear a =

  mention about the founders.  The guys from Louisiana  (Hey Yan, you 
  m=
ight want to fix Luisiana to Lousiana.)  were the founders.  The 
  founder=
s were the ones that came up with the whole idea of Neo Beast 
  Wars RPG. =
 Does the name Biostinger familiar to you.  Well I am not 
  him, but I go =
to the same school as him and I made NBWRPG with him.

     I was the one t=
hat called him one day and said hey (I don't think 
  he wants his name rev=
eled) Biostinger, you know how you wanted to 
  make an Beast Wars Rpg earl=
ier, well I have an Idea for the Story 
  line.  So I told him the story li=
ne.  He liked it and we figure that 
  our good friend should be a co-found=
er.  We than had Biostinger 
  go into the Beastwars RPG AOL Chatroom(He wa=
s the only one with AOL)  
  I ended up making sites saying join NBWRPG.  A=
nd well Firestorm 316 
  gr81(The Co-founder) just sat around and watched.
=

     So, I am instrumental in the making of this RPG.

     And also, Whem=
 I say founder, I mean when I made this RPG, and if 
  I say council, then =
I am mentioning the Council.

  NOTE:  The main reason Firestorm 316 Gr81 j=
ust sat around and watch 
  is because hid Dad was very very very very very=
 very very Strict.

  NOTE:  If anyone wants to take this up with me than e=
mail me at 
  proto@...(Temp address While Hotmail fix things up.)

=

  right now. My friend=

  didn't go on at all. Al=
ot of mixed emotions about this whole Coucil 
  Election for me!...
  >
